VROOLI_LIFECYCLE_MANAGED.description: Indicates the service is managed by Vrooli lifecycle

API_BASE_URL.description: Public URL for the API server (used in widget embed code)

POSTGRES_URL.description: Complete PostgreSQL connection URL (overrides individual settings)

CORS_ALLOWED_ORIGINS.description: Comma-separated list of allowed CORS origins. Use '*' for embeddable widget mode (allows any origin). For production, specify exact origins like 'https://example.com,https://app.example.com'
